rule.q: Can I fly over people with a drone?

answer: Maintain visual line of sight (VLOS) with the aircraft at all times. Do not fly over people or moving vehicles.

citations.text: Do not fly over people or moving vehicles.
Maintain visual line of sight (VLOS) with the aircraft at all times.
Maximum altitude is 400 feet AGL unless within 400 feet of a structure.
Do not operate in controlled airspace without authorization.

spans.text: Maintain visual line of sight (VLOS) with the aircraft at all times. Do not fly over people or moving vehicles.
